item.title: Touhidul Islam: Portfolio
item.dc:creator: zubair224
item.description: I created a dynamic portfolio website for Touhidul Islam using WordPress, designed to showcase his professional journey and personal interests. The site includes key sections like "About Me," where visitors can learn more about his background, and "Experience," which highlights his career milestones. The "Projects" section features detailed case studies of his work, while "Contact" provides an easy way for potential collaborators to get in touch. Additionally, a unique "Travel" section shares his adventures and explorations. This well-structured and visually appealing website reflects Touhidul’s professional and personal interests, enhancing his online presence.
item.content:encoded: I created a dynamic portfolio website for Touhidul Islam using WordPress, designed to showcase his professional journey and personal interests. Additionally, a unique "Travel" section shares his adventures and explorations. This well-structured and visually appealing website reflects Touhidul’s professional and personal interests, enhancing his online presence.

item.title: Predicting Company Bankruptcy and Financial Status Analysis Using Machine Learning and Deep Learning
item.dc:creator: zubair224
item.description: This project, predicts inflation rates based on the following factors: CPI Value, Currency against USD, Money Supply, Interest Rates, GDP (in BDT) and GDP Per Capita. This research used four machine learning models and four deep learning models for predicting future rates. The best machine learning model for forecasting inflation was Random Forest with an R-squared score of 0.96 and the best deep learning model was found to be a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) with an accuracy of 0.94.
item.content:encoded: This project, predicts inflation rates based on the following factors: CPI Value, Currency against USD, Money Supply, Interest Rates, GDP (in BDT) and GDP Per Capita. This research used four machine learning models and four deep learning models for predicting future rates. The best machine learning model for forecasting inflation was Random Forest with an R-squared score of 0.96 and the best deep learning model was found to be a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) with an accuracy of 0.94.

item.title: Data Driven Approach to Forecasting Inflation inBangladesh
item.dc:creator: zubair224
item.description: The research uses machine learning techniques to predict the chances that a company goes bankrupt based on various factors. For predicting the bankruptcy, we have used various machine learning techniques: SVM, XGBoost, Random Forest, Logistic Regression and Decision Tree. On performing our experiments with the models, we found Random Forest to be the best technique for predicting bankruptcy. The model produced a Training accuracy of 99.1%. We also applied different deep learning methods such as DNN, GRU, TCN to compare ML models performance. We found that each of these 3 DL models produce a training accuracy of approximately 98%. Bankruptcy has been on the rise over the past decade and it is very important to predict and take precautions for a business.
item.content:encoded: The research uses machine learning techniques to predict the chances that a company goes bankrupt based on various factors. For predicting the bankruptcy, we have used various machine learning techniques: SVM, XGBoost, Random Forest, Logistic Regression and Decision Tree. On performing our experiments with the models, we found Random Forest to be the best technique for predicting bankruptcy. The model produced a Training accuracy of 99.1%. We also applied different deep learning methods such as DNN, GRU, TCN to compare ML models performance. We found that each of these 3 DL models produce a training accuracy of approximately 98%. Bankruptcy has been on the rise over the past decade and it is very important to predict and take precautions for a business.

item.title: PetDekho: Pet-Care Application and Website
item.dc:creator: zubair224
item.description: PetDekho is a startup based project that is a one stop solution for pets. The pet industry in Bangladesh is a market which is yet to be fully explored and PetDekho aims to do just that. The project solves problems for pet business owners, veterinarians, pet specialists and pet owners. PetDekho aims to provide services such as a marketplace, vet services, pet specialist services and also pet transportation services. The project is a website which provides the services mentioned above. The project also has a mobile application which is used to transport animals.
item.content:encoded: PetDekho is a startup based project that is a one stop solution for pets. The pet industry in Bangladesh is a market which is yet to be fully explored and PetDekho aims to do just that. The project solves problems for pet business owners, veterinarians, pet specialists and pet owners. PetDekho aims to provide services such as a marketplace, vet services, pet specialist services and also pet transportation services. The project is a website which provides the services mentioned above. The project also has a mobile application which is used to transport animals.

item.title: Millyracks: An Online Clothing Store
item.dc:creator: zubair224
item.description:
MillyRacks is a WordPress-based website that embodies a unique aesthetic, blending classic streetwear with modern influences. Our brand celebrates the fusion of vintage styles and cultural elements, designed for bold individuals who are confident and unapologetically themselves. We believe in fashion as a powerful means of self-expression, helping our customers embrace their authentic selves.
Drawing inspiration from the rich history of streetwear, our clothing pays tribute to iconic brands of the 80s and 90s while incorporating vibrant contemporary designs. Crafted with high-quality materials and striking graphical illustrations, MillyRacks aims to redefine streetwear for today’s trendsetters.
item.content:encoded:
MillyRacks is a WordPress-based website that embodies a unique aesthetic, blending classic streetwear with modern influences. Our brand celebrates the fusion of vintage styles and cultural elements, designed for bold individuals who are confident and unapologetically themselves. We believe in fashion as a powerful means of self-expression, helping our customers embrace their authentic selves.
Drawing inspiration from the rich history of streetwear, our clothing pays tribute to iconic brands of the 80s and 90s while incorporating vibrant contemporary designs. Crafted with high-quality materials and striking graphical illustrations, MillyRacks aims to redefine streetwear for today’s trendsetters.

item.title: High Efficiency Comparison of ProgrammingLanguages in Algorithm Development
item.dc:creator: zubair224
item.description: The study is to compare efficiency of of programming languages based on certain criterion. The study uses different algorithms with different dataset sizes to compare the efficiency. The following report will discuss, analyse and evaluate the efficiency of three programming languages- C, Java and Python with different algorithms and datasets in the form of graphs.
item.content:encoded: The study is to compare efficiency of of programming languages based on certain criterion. The study uses different algorithms with different dataset sizes to compare the efficiency. The following report will discuss, analyse and evaluate the efficiency of three programming languages- C, Java and Python with different algorithms and datasets in the form of graphs.

item.title: Daowat: Canteen Management System
item.dc:creator: zubair224
item.description:
This project proposes a website for managing cafeteria operations, aiming to transition from traditional methods to a more efficient digital solution. The canteen is a vital part of educational institutions, yet its management often remains outdated. Our system addresses issues like food availability, payment challenges, and staffing efficiency.
The website will feature user-friendly ordering and payment options, real-time inventory management, and a robust database for tracking menu items and customer information. By streamlining processes, we aim to enhance customer satisfaction and overall cafeteria performance, making this system applicable to various food service environments, including corporate canteens and restaurants.
item.content:encoded:
This project proposes a website for managing cafeteria operations, aiming to transition from traditional methods to a more efficient digital solution. The canteen is a vital part of educational institutions, yet its management often remains outdated. Our system addresses issues like food availability, payment challenges, and staffing efficiency.
The website will feature user-friendly ordering and payment options, real-time inventory management, and a robust database for tracking menu items and customer information. By streamlining processes, we aim to enhance customer satisfaction and overall cafeteria performance, making this system applicable to various food service environments, including corporate canteens and restaurants.

item.title: Arduino based solar tracker
item.dc:creator: zubair224
item.description: The project explores an Arduino-based solar tracker, a device designed to enhance solar energy absorption by maintaining the optimal angle with the sun. By utilizing light-dependent resistors (LDRs) for automatic control, this dual-axis tracker adjusts the solar panel's position throughout the day. The project aims to provide an open hardware/software test bench for students to understand control theory and its practical applications. This solar tracking system demonstrates increased efficiency compared to static panels, leading to higher current, voltage, and power outputs. Overall, it showcases the benefits of a solar tracker in reducing electricity costs and optimizing solar energy utilization.
item.content:encoded: The project explores an Arduino-based solar tracker, a device designed to enhance solar energy absorption by maintaining the optimal angle with the sun. By utilizing light-dependent resistors (LDRs) for automatic control, this dual-axis tracker adjusts the solar panel's position throughout the day. The project aims to provide an open hardware/software test bench for students to understand control theory and its practical applications. This solar tracking system demonstrates increased efficiency compared to static panels, leading to higher current, voltage, and power outputs. Overall, it showcases the benefits of a solar tracker in reducing electricity costs and optimizing solar energy utilization.

item.title: Simple Movie and TV show Database
item.dc:creator: zubair224
item.description: The project is Movie and TV show database. This is a database that will allow users to view information of their favorite movies and TV shows such as information about the actors, director, synopsis, etc. Users will be able to create accounts and rate and review movies and TV shows as well. Users will be able to create discussions which other users can join as well. Users can even request to add new movies or TV Shows as well. This database allows users to stay connected with the world of movies and TV shows. It is loosely based on popular sites such as IMDB and Rotten Tomatoes.
item.content:encoded:
Introduction
The project is Movie and TV show database. This is a database that will allow users to view
information of their favorite movies and TV shows such as information about the actors, director,
synopsis, etc. Users will be able to create accounts and rate and review movies and TV shows as
well. Users will be able to create discussions which other users can join as well. Users can even
request to add new movies or TV Shows as well.
This database allows users to stay connected with the world of movies and TV shows. It is
loosely based on popular sites such as IMDB and Rotten Tomatoes.
Background research/Motivations
This project, Movie and TV show database is based on/inspired from movie and TV show review
sites such as IMDB, which is the largest database of movies and TV shows and Rotten
Tomatoes, which is one of the most popular review sites/blogs in the world.
This project also appealed to us because we could store a large amount of data and make the
database full of variety. It is a database that we could use to help the users know about their
favorite movies and TV Shows. It is also a database where we could add interesting features that
would not only be helpful for the users but also for us, by working on different features, it will
help us learn and grow as programmers and coders.
We have tried to implement new features in the project such as user discussions which could be
very useful for movie and TV show fanatics as they can not only just check reviews and ratings
but also get insight from other users and share their views as well, similar to a group chat.
Resources\Technologies
To create the project “Movie and TV Show Database”, we used XAMPP to work on SQL and
store data in the database. We used PHP for connection between the front and back end. We used
HTML and CSS for the front end. Visual Studio Code is the software we used for working using
PHP.
Project Design
In the above flowchart, it shows that once the user enters the website, they have to either register or
login. Then, they can access the menu. In the menu they can view the list of movies, list of TV shows,
discussion option or the request option. They can search for movies and TV shows and view their ratings
and, details, etc. Users can take part in a discussion panel where they can interact with other users
about their favorite movies or TV shows. Users can also use the request option to request us to add
movies or TV shows which they were unable to find.
Sitemap
Snapshots

Conclusion and Future Work
This was a very interesting project for all three of us. It helped us learn how create database
projects using php and html css. This was the first time for us working with a proper database
and it will surely help us in the future. Not only has it given us a proper idea of working with
databases, but it has also helped us to learn how to create projects under deadlines and pressure.
This project has given us motivation to deal with new projects and to learn new languages and
frameworks. We have already planned to work on our existing project and add even more new
features to it. The user interface can be improved, more features such as polls could be added.
These are just some of the features that we can work on. The existing features can be developed
and can be made even better. This project has definitely has been a huge boon to us and will
serve as motivation for developing new projects.

item.title: E-Healthcare System (Java Swing)
item.dc:creator: zubair224
item.description: The E-Healthcare System developed using Java Swing is a comprehensive application designed to streamline healthcare management. Users can easily create accounts to access various features, including booking appointments with healthcare providers and viewing essential COVID-19 information. The system allows for seamless generation of receipts for services rendered, enhancing financial transparency. Users can efficiently manage their records by updating or deleting them as necessary, ensuring that their health information is always current. Additionally, the application provides options to check and print appointment details, making it user-friendly and efficient. This system aims to improve patient experience and simplify healthcare interactions.
item.content:encoded: The E-Healthcare System developed using Java Swing is a comprehensive application designed to streamline healthcare management. Users can easily create accounts to access various features, including booking appointments with healthcare providers and viewing essential COVID-19 information. The system allows for seamless generation of receipts for services rendered, enhancing financial transparency. Users can efficiently manage their records by updating or deleting them as necessary, ensuring that their health information is always current. Additionally, the application provides options to check and print appointment details, making it user-friendly and efficient. This system aims to improve patient experience and simplify healthcare interactions.
